name: Reindeer Recruit
description:
Santa was almost ready to give presents to children however Reindeers who were suppose to pull the sleigh have caught a cold.

Let's "Recruit" 30 animals from somewhere on this island as temporary Reindeer.

How to play

Arrow Key: Move

Space: Jump

Mouse Click: Click the button

Supported Languages

English, Japanese

Go to "Option" or "オプション" to change the language.

Made by

DDA The Lazy Ant
